resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75069</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75069</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660c-4240-4474-2318-57833e4262e6#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent János evangélista, 8. század vége, Trinity College Library, Dublin, miniatúra.</string>
            <string language="en">Saint John the Evangelist, end of 8th century, Trinity College Library, Dublin, illumination.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heiliger Johannes der Evangelist, Ende des 8. 
Jahrhunderts, Dreiheit-Hochschulbibliothek, Dublin, Ablichtung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Saint John l'évangéliste, fin de 8ème siècle,
bibliothèque d'université de trinité, Dublin, illumination.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saint john o evangelist, fim do 8o século, 
biblioteca da faculdade do trinity, Dublin, iluminação.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">John santo il evangelist, conclusione dell'ottavo
secolo, libreria dell'università della trinità, Dublino, 
illuminazione.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγιος John evangelist, τέλος του 8ου αιώνα, 
βιβλιοθήκη κολλεγίου τριάδας, Δουβλίνο, φωτισμός.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Santo Juan el Evangelista, final del 8vo siglo, 
biblioteca de la universidad de la trinidad, Dublín, iluminación.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kellsi kódex miniatúráin megjelenik a négy evangélista alakja.</string>
            <string language="en">The figure of the four evangelist appears on the illuminations of the Irish Book of Kells</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kódexminiatúra,  a brit szigetek művészetéből,  </string>
            <string language="en">illumination, from the art of the British Island</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung des Evangelisten vier erscheint auf den 
Ablichtungen des irischen Buches von Kells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure de l'évangéliste quatre apparaît sur les 
illuminations du livre irlandais de Kells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura do evangelist quatro aparece nas iluminações do
livro irish de Kells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura del evangelist quattro compare sulle 
illuminazioni del libro irlandese di Kells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός evangelist τέσσερα εμφανίζεται στους 
φωτισμούς του ιρλανδικού βιβλίου Kells</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura del evangelista cuatro aparece en las 
iluminaciones del libro irlandés de Kells</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ablichtung, von der kunst der britischen Insel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illumination, de l'art de l'île britannique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">iluminação, da arte do console britânico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illuminazione, da arte dell'isola britannica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωτισμός, από την τέχνη του βρετανικού νησιού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">iluminación, del arte de la isla británica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75069</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
